channel.title: Markdown2social on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown2social on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)

item.title: The Medium experiment wrap-up
item.author: julio@meroh.net (Julio Merino)
item.description: Eight months ago, I decided to try Medium as the platform on which to post my essays. Over this time I have published a handful of posts in there—8, to be precise, which is… a very shy number—but the results have been quite satisfactory: the WYSIWYG composer is excellent, the analytics tools are simple but to the point, the looks are great, and the community is nice (though I haven’t been able to tap into it just yet). But where have things failed?

item.title: Introducing Markdown2Social
item.author: julio@meroh.net (Julio Merino)
item.description: Markdown2Social is a new open-source tool, originally written at Google for Google-internal posts, that converts Markdown documents to Google+ posts.
